name: THE STATE OF LOVE
description:
#DAIANA%20LAZZARIN 
#daiana_lazzarin
@daiana_lazzarin
Title: "THE STATE OF LOVE"
Duration: 0:01:22
Direction, Production and Sound: Daiana Lucia Lazzarin (DLL)
Year 2010
Genre: Video art.
Technique: Mix of Digital Photographs, 2D and 3D Animations, along with Digital Filming. Use of 3D Studio Max, Adobe Photoshop, Macromedia Flash, and Image Ready.
Province: Mendoza
Country: Argentina 
Synopsis: Daiana Lazzarin, participated by sending two videos, of the III Video Art Award, Astillero City Council, IV Festival of Photography and Video FOCONORTE, held on April 30, 2010, at El Almacén de las Artes (Market Square s / n, 39610 Astillero, Cantabria, Spain).
The state of Love ... who can describe that deep and unlimited sensation, multiple are the representations and allegories of it; however each one knows his own deep and unique feeling.
Love envelops us, absorbs us and traps us; it is literally impossible to escape from their hands ...
The sensations it produces are incomparable and unrepeatable, a fire that runs through our being, butterflies that fly in our mind and steal our reason.
In this video I wanted to reflect in a subtle and aesthetic way each of the sensations that surround the lover ...
In the sea of ​​possibilities that this topic can provoke, I offer this, my particular approach.
